description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 26544/APP/2023/2303 dated 09-10-23 (Redevelopment of an existing Children's Home to provide new build residential institution development (Use Class C2). Erection of 3no. 2 storey buildings, providing accommodation for 12 young people and 6 household staff and an Educational building; hard and soft landscaping, communal and private garden areas and a Multi-Use Games Area.) to alter MUGA and landscaping
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers APL001 Rev. A, APL005 Rev. A, APL006 Rev. B, APL007 Rev. B, APL008 Rev A, APL009 Rev A, APL010 Rev. A, APL011 Rev A, APL012 Rev. A, APL013 Rev. A, APL014 Rev. A  Planning Permission Ref: 31260/APP/2022/3605 dated 15-02-23 and drawing number APL004 Rev. D and Design and Access Statement Addendum (June 2024, Hunters) and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions Hillingdon Local Plan Parts 1 (November 2012) and 2 (January 2020) and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, which is incorporated in the above revised approved plans condition, all other approved plans and conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 26544/APP/2023/2303 dated 09-10-23 must be discharged/adhered to as per the planning permission.
